Title: [ANN][ICO-SALE] ⚡✈️🏥 MEDIPEDIA - Innovation of Medical Tourism platform ⚡✈️🏥
Body: Hi BellamyWilliams, thanks for your question.  Okay, basically the Medipedia platform uses blockchain to create a decentralized medical tourism information and service system that can connect the medical consumers and patients to reliable healthcare services for information, appointment and treatment. The decentralized blockchain helps reduce the cost for medical consumers while improving the quality and reliability of medical tourism services.  The reason why Medipedia project is focused around creating a decentralized database of medical information is that only this method can ensure the complete transparency of the information which can be accessed by anyone in the need. As of now, most of the medical data is controlled by hospitals and cannot be accessed by medical consumers seeking accurate information about service providers. Medipedia platform is aimed at decentralizing all this information as it believes that this is the only way to solve the existing problems of the medical industry.  Benefits of the blockchain technology in Medipedia  Decentralized information system The blockchain technology helps Medipedia establish a decentralized medical tourism service platform with predefined rights for patients. The platform can be used by medical consumers to find and connect with reliable medical providers and vice versa. Transparency One of the benefits of the use of blockchain technology is that all the medical information including patients’ history and records from various medical care services are recorded on a secure blockchain and can be accessed by the consumers. Increased security The blockchain technology adds to the security of the Medipedia platform by enabling an encryption system through which the information of medical consumers is protected against unauthorised access, use or hack. Easy Accessibility Medipedia maintains a distributed database of patient/medical information that can be accessed anywhere and by anyone (with access rights) via an internet connection. No need to contact separate medical providers or hospitals in order to access the information/records of specific patients. Reliability The information, as well as the services, provided through the Medipedia platform are cross-checked for reliability and accuracy on a regular basis. The data is added to the records only after its integrity is verified through various means. Interoperability & Comparability Last but not the least, Medipedia provides access to various third-party applications that can freely connect with the platform and/or develop their own applications on the Medipedia API.  Medipedia also maintains a vast record of medical providers and doctors, which consumers can search through to find and compare relevant medical services. Consumers can also send a request asking for more details about a particular medical provider, who in turn can respond with the information. The Medipedia app can also be used for booking appointments with any of the available medical providers within the platform. In-app Payments with Cryptocurrency Another benefit of the use of the blockchain technology is that the platform now has its own cryptocurrency — Medipedia Token — which consumers can use for making payments for various services and purchases within the application.

Title: [ANN][ICO-SALE] ⚡✈️🏥 MEDIPEDIA - Innovation of Medical Tourism platform ⚡✈️🏥
Body: The medical markets are facing a lot of issues that prevent patients from getting reliable & high-quality medical care at affordable prices. At the same time, medical service providers are struggling with the problems of unavailability of reliable medical staff, lack of technology access and resources, limited reach, etc.  Some of the other problems being faced by medical consumers, providers and other parties include:  High medical service fee High fee charged by intermediaries High waiting time The absence of a credible and transparent platform to acquire information about medical institutions and personnel The limited number of expert medical personnel Inconvenience in the medical reservation Lack of promotion of good healthcare providers Difficulty to find reliable medical staff and services The limited or late reach of advanced technologies Limited globalization of medical industry Degrading economy Agents problems like bankruptcy, false advertising, fraud and scam  Basically, the industry is struggling with many such issues and eagerly waiting for a reliable solution that can help everyone involved in this space.  The blockchain technology can help create a decentralized medical tourism information database that could be securely accessed and used by medical institutions and patients. The blockchain will protect the data from tampering and also removes the need for any centralized or intermediary service/person, thus reducing the cost of medical services. Medipedia.io is based on the similar concept.  The Medipedia platform uses blockchain to create a decentralized medical tourism information and service system that can connect the medical consumers and patients to reliable healthcare services for information, appointment and treatment. The decentralized blockchain helps reduce the cost for medical consumers while improving the quality and reliability of medical tourism services.  The reason why Medipedia project is focused around creating a decentralized database of medical information is that only this method can ensure the complete transparency of the information which can be accessed by anyone in the need. As of now, most of the medical data is controlled by hospitals and cannot be accessed by medical consumers seeking accurate information about service providers. Medipedia platform is aimed at decentralizing all this information as it believes that this is the only way to solve the existing problems of the medical industry.

Body: Hi harrylucky67,  Reduce of cost Medipedia enables medical information to be shared between patients and medical institutions. When a medical consumer asks about the service they want to obtain, this inquiry is queried to all of the target medical institutions, and each interested medical institution responds to the medical consumer again, and the medical consumer ultimately selects one of several options you can choose. This creates natural competition from medical institutions, eliminating the current costly problems and providing patient-centered care. Less waiting time Within the Medipedia platform, medical consumers can choose which medical institutions they want to receive care directly. You can choose a hospital that can be reserved through the Medipedia platform if you have a reservation for a hospital in your home country and are going to medical tourism abroad. Also, if you can not make a reservation for a desired medical institution during a visit, you can make a reservation at a hospital with similar medical care experience. High quality medical services Because all the medical information in the Medipedia platform is stored, medical institutions will try to provide a slightly better service to their patients to build their credibility, which in turn leads directly to the patient receiving a high level of medical care. It is also possible to provide medical services that have not been provided until now by eliminating the geographical barriers of providing medical services. Title: [ANN][ICO-SALE] ⚡✈️🏥 MEDIPEDIA - Innovation of Medical Tourism platform ⚡✈️🏥
Body: Hi developno1,  Thanks for your interest and support, We really appreciate your words.  Medical consumers can use the Medipedia platform to get remote consultations about desired hospitals and treatments before visiting each country. Medical consumers want to be treated within an acceptable budget, but due to the nature of medical service, it is difficult for each medical provider to provide accurate price and treatment details before treatment and consultation. Therefore, when one goes on a medical tourism through agents without consultation, he / she is spending a lot of money in addition to the acceptable budget due to incidental treatment.  In order to alleviate these inconveniences, Medipedia is planning to build a system within the platform for consulting with the hospitals before visiting. Medical consumers can consult with the hospital by choosing hospitals according to the desired medical subjects and the desired budget, and expenses can be paid using the MPR points given at the time of signing up, or by professional consultation tickets purchased with MEP tokens. Body: Hi Prodigye,  Thanks for your interest, We really appreciate your words. Basically, Medipedia is an open platform. Based on the medical services stored in the platform, various applications can be freely connected. This allows external participants and medical providers to use the SDK and API provided by Medipedia to develop their own applications. Body: Hi Margaretlove,  Thanks for your interest, We really appreciate your words. Medical institutions and Service Providers registered on the Medipedia BlockChain network are verified and enjoy approval and faith of their current patients. But this is not the only filtering parameter for medical service providers and doctors. Medipedia provides better accessibility to the medical tourism services by concurrently receiving the service information from all medical providers subscribed to the Data Pool required by the medical consumers.  AA Access: Like the information of patients/medical consumers, Information of medical service providers are also stored in a distributed database. This paves way double A or Anywhere-Anytime Access via any device with an Internet connection.  Data Integrity: Post account creation and registration the patient/institute data is stored as blocks on the blockchain network. Not a single record (both of the patient and the doctor/institute ) can be altered or deleted.  Credibility: Medical Services are provided by only those medical personnel/doctors whose credentials have been certified through the Medipedia platform system.  Data Security: Medipedia stores patient/personal information, medical institution information, and medical record history in a decentralized data repository. The backup data is continuously maintained and are cryptographically verified and then stored as blocks on the Medipedia Network. These blocks are immutable by nature.  In conclusion, we can say that the Medipedia Blockchain Network is the future of robust medical tourism services. The records of the services offered by the medical institutes are decentralised and immutable. This brings much needed transparency to check the overburden of increasing unwanted health costs on the common man. Medipedia platform is aimed at decentralizing all this information as it believes that this is the only way to solve the existing problems of the medical industry.  Benefits of the blockchain technology in Medipedia Decentralized information system  The blockchain technology helps Medipedia establish a decentralized medical tourism service platform with predefined rights for patients. The platform can be used by medical consumers to find and connect with reliable medical providers and vice versa.  Transparency  One of the benefits of the use of blockchain technology is that all the medical information including patients’ history and records from various medical care services are recorded on a secure blockchain and can be accessed by the consumers.  Increased security  The blockchain technology adds to the security of the Medipedia platform by enabling an encryption system through which the information of medical consumers is protected against unauthorised access, use or hack.  Easy Accessibility  Medipedia maintains a distributed database of patient/medical information that can be accessed anywhere and by anyone (with access rights) via an internet connection. No need to contact separate medical providers or hospitals in order to access the information/records of specific patients.  Reliability  The information, as well as the services, provided through the Medipedia platform are cross-checked for reliability and accuracy on a regular basis. The data is added to the records only after its integrity is verified through various means.  Interoperability & Comparability  Last but not the least, Medipedia provides access to various third-party applications that can freely connect with the platform and/or develop their own applications on the Medipedia API.  Medipedia also maintains a vast record of medical providers and doctors, which consumers can search through to find and compare relevant medical services. Consumers can also send a request asking for more details about a particular medical provider, who in turn can respond with the information. The Medipedia app can also be used for booking appointments with any of the available medical providers within the platform.  In-app Payments with Cryptocurrency  Another benefit of the use of the blockchain technology is that the platform now has its own cryptocurrency — Medipedia Token — which consumers can use for making payments for various services and purchases within the application.  So, the above points and discussion clarify that Medipedia is indeed a true blockchain-based solution to most, if not all, of the existing problems in the healthcare industry.

Title: [ANN][ICO-SALE] ⚡✈️🏥 MEDIPEDIA - Innovation of Medical Tourism platform ⚡✈️🏥
Body: Hi Mr. dentolas, thanks for reaching out to us! We really appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us.  Medical consumers can use the Medipedia platform to get remote consultations about desired hospitals and treatments before visiting each country. Medical consumers can use the Medipedia platform to find and request customized medical services they want. The Medipedia team will provide social media and blogging services within the platform to make it easier to get the latest medical technology and medical institution information. The Medipedia team will improves the accuracy and efficiency of future object activities on the platform by introducing medical staff reviews, medical consumer reviews, and external participant review systems based on the big data accumulated within platform. The Medipedia platform will keeps all of its history on the blockchain network when all economic activity occurs. These stored information are used to make big data for users convenience and medical industry development. Medipedia also provides a tourism and travel service app on the Medipedia platform that can be used with these services for medical consumers. Foreign medical consumers may need interpretation services when using medical services. Medipedia will also add interpretation service app to the platform, which is available to external participants, to address this situation. Medipedia will also provide the platform with health insurance product service application to help healthcare consumers take advantage of safer services and medical incidents. Medipedia is a decentralized open platform that promotes communication among participants. To help with this, the Medical Tourism Services Alliance System App will be utilized. The Medical Tourism Services Alliance System creates an ecosystem that can provide dynamic and differentiated medical tourism services through collaboration between healthcare providers providing different health care services or between healthcare providers and external service providers.
